CustomField.description: The field, or parent-level field (comma separated by relationship name to parent level field name, in this case) to use when determining the correct Dated Exchange Rate
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The field, or parent-level field (comma separated by relationship name to parent level field name, in this case) to use when determining the correct Dated Exchange Rate
CustomField.label: Currency Field Mapping (Comma-separated)
